item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Truth is, I'm a good Catholic girl. The faith has always been elusive, but the guilt is intractable. " -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Don Piper
item.description: "I've learned that if I stay busy, especially by helping others, I don't think about my pain. In an odd way, my pain is its own therapy. I intend to go on until I can't go anymore. " -- Don Piper

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Don Piper
item.description: "One question keeps troubling me: Why?. . . The short answer: I don't know. and yet that single word, why, remains the consummate human query. By nature, we're curious. We want to know. " -- Don Piper

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Children at once accept joy and happiness with quick familiarity, being themselves naturally all happiness and joy. " -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "It was all over with him. Marius loved a woman. His destiny was entering upon the unknown. " -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "And that almost everyone was struggling to wake up, to be loved, and not feel so afraid all the time. That's what the cars, degrees, booze, and drugs were about." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Sometimes grace works like water wings when you feel you are sinking." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Sometimes I think that Jesus watches my neurotic struggles, and shakes his head and grips his forehead and starts tossing back mojitos." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "But I have to believe that Jesus prefers honesty to anything else. I was saying, "Here's who I am," and that is where most improvement has to begin." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Disaster usually happens for me when everything I have counted on has stopped working, including all my best skills, intentions, and good ideas." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Mary Doria Russell
item.description: "Rain falls on everyone, lightning strikes some. What cannot be changed is best forgotten. God made the world, and He saw that it was good. Not fair. Not happy. Not perfect. Good." -- Mary Doria Russell

item.title: Tinafb add a quote by Mary Doria Russell
Tinafb add a quote by Sharon M. Draper
item.description: "What would you do if you could fly?" Mrs. V asks as she glances from the bird to me. "Is that on the quiz?" I ask, grinning as I type. "I think we've studied just about everything else." Mrs. V chuckles. "I'd be scared to let go," I type. "Afraid you'd fall?" she asks. "No. Afraid it would feel so good, I'd just fly away." -- Sharon M. Draper
